greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: In decimal representation: replace each even positioned digit with the digit sum of its double.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index entries for sequences related to decimal expansion of n
program: where (n', td) = divMod n 100; (t, d) = divMod td 10
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 08 2014
